group_1.textRight: For real, come on! Why? I mean, whyyy?
Myako-senpai! You just had to push a@little bit more!
So why're you backin' off now?

group_1.textLeft: Suppose you're in a situation you can barely@grasp, and you've just been saved, then...
...BAM! Someone says they like you, and@other girls are around. Imagine that.
You wouldn't know how to refuse! It must've@felt like a flash mob.

group_1.textRight: (She has a point.)
But I thought the mood wasn't the sort@where he'd, like, flat out refuse!
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I'm just sayinnng!

group_1.textLeft: He couldn't say anything because he didn't@want to be rude, that's all.
I did save his life, you know.
So waiting longer would've just put him even@more on the spot, don't you think?

group_1.textRight: We dunno that!
Maybe he was just busy gettin' himself lost@in your eyes or somethin'!

group_1.textLeft: He's my crush, remember? Pretty certain I'm@right about him.

group_1.textRight: But... Even so!
I dunno. If I was you, I wouldn't give up!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Emiri.
I'm actually pretty satisfied with the way@it all went down.
You'll get it when you get your own crush.
Also, well... I forgot to give you this.
It's your part of my chocolate.

group_1.textRight: But you said you don't make any for@friends...

group_1.textLeft: You're also helping me with events and@stuff, so consider this my thanks.
And, yeah...
It was pretty rude of me earlier, like it@was some hand-me-down chocolate of his.

group_1.textRight: Th-This is so cool?!
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I love ya so much, Myako-senpai! Yours@for life! I'll always take care of ya!
*Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300350:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Alrighty then!
I'm not the boring me from before anymore!
Today's experience opens the third stage of@my coming-of-age!
Just watch me, Emiri!
Don't lose your competitive spirit when you@see how quickly I'll progress!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yuppers! Spring resolution: One size up,@am I right?
[chara:301201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
I didn't know that.
Does one even grow physically when they're@rejected?

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]WAAAAAAHHH!!!

group_1.textRight: Meiyui...it was a metaphor.

group_1.textLeft: Waaagh!
[bgEffect:shakeSmall]Metaphors stink!
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]G-g-go gie in a fwire! *Sob*
Oh noooes! Myako-senpai's returning to@her old wild waaays!
